original_text: “Do not follow the crowd in doing wrong. When you give testimony in a lawsuit, do not pervert justice by siding with the crowd,
korean_text: 다수를 따라 악을 행하지 말며 송사에 다수를 따라 부당한 증언을 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Do not follow the crowd in doing wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 잘못된 일을 할 때 군중을 따르지 말라.

sentences.original_text: When you give testimony in a lawsuit,
do not pervert justice by siding with the crowd,
